versionDetailList.title: Some minor features and optimizations
versionDetailList.log:
● update oshi-core to 5.8.6
● update flatlaf to 2.0-rc1(Support Windows 11 snap layouts menu, macOS screen menu optimization)
● processes sort method added same as the oshi's demo
● add cpu usage chart
● make System Boot Time and Uptime readable
● add System Info Test function menu same as oshi-core
